title: Industrial robots - worldwide sales 2004 to 2018
summary: Overall Sales in thousand units has increased over the Year.
Sales in thousand units is roughly constant from 2005 to 2008, slightly decreasing from 2008 to 2009, rapidly increasing from 2009 to 2011, and finally roughly constant from 2011 to 2012.
The line rapidly increased by 101.67% from Year 2009 to 2010.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2009 and 2010.
The highest Sales in thousand units, of value 166.0 was reached at Year 2011
The lowest Sales in thousand units, of value 60.0 was reported at Year 2009
min_summary: In general Sales in thousand units has rose over the Year.
Sales in thousand units is roughly constant from 2005 to 2008, slightly decreasing from 2008 to 2009, rapidly increasing from 2009 to 2011, and finally roughly constant from 2011 to 2012.
